name: Forest Game
desc: An immersive environment made with unity. All models, textures and sounds have been created by me. Photoshop and Maya were used for modelling and texturing

name: Android App Prototype
desc: An App that I developed for a university project. This app was designed using Adobe XD and implemented using Angular and Ionic frameworks.

name: Horror Game
desc: An immersive environment made with unity. Playmaker plugin used for interactive game elements. Designed to be a horror game experience.

name: Portfolio Site
desc: Using Adobe XD to mockup a rapid prototype for this portfolio website. Vanilla HTML, CSS used and created by myself. NodeJS and Express for backend.

name: 3D Book
desc: A book desgined to teach young students the modelling program 123D Design. This was a part of a High School Project. Adobe InDesign, Word, Illustrator

name: Charity Motion Graphic
desc: A motion graphic video designed with Adobe After Effects for a charity organisation. All assets and animation were made by myself

name: Human Site
desc: An interactive website for a university project. One of my first websites. HTML, CSS was used with a combination of jQuery for interactive elements.

name: Massage Remake
desc: An interactive website for a university project. One of my first websites. HTML, CSS was used with a combination of jQuery for interactive elements.
